projects.title: Callable Convertible Bond Pricing
projects.bodyText:
- Collaborated with a professor at Cornell Johnson Business School 
 - Collected real-time data on Callable Convertible Bonds from Bloomberg Terminal 
 - Developed Monte Carlo simulations and Binomial Tree Models for bond pricing 
 - Effectively communicated pricing results using an interactive user interface utilizing Excel Visual Basics

projects.title: Stock Prediction System-Based Data Analysis
projects.bodyText:
- Worked with Chinese Academy of Science 
 - Developed a Python web crawler to collect financial news and public reviews, utilized Chat GPT API to label 
 - Created a comprehensive dataset with investor sentiment index, macroeconomic data, and fundamental data 
 - Achieved an R-squared value of 0.71 in stock price forecasting by the LSTM model

projects.title: Emotion Detection
projects.bodyText:
- mentorship program by Borealis AI, backed by Royal Bank of Canada 
 - Utilized a Convolutional Neural Network, ResNet-18, to classify emotions based on picture pixels

projects.title: IMDB Genre Classification Competition
projects.bodyText:
- A competition held by Kaggle 
 - developed machine learning models to classify movie genre based on descriptions 
 - preprocessed the raw data of description using Natural Language Processing 
 - Handled sparse data

projects.title: New York Taxi Trip Duration Prediction Competition
projects.bodyText:
- A competition held by Kaggle, achieved second place 
 - Constructed a Boosting model to predict trip durations 
 - engineered features including geometric rotation, spheral distance and interation terms
